item.description:
Art About Town - Westport

Meet Beverly at Matsu Sushi, she will be wearing a beaded orange jewelry scarf.  This is an informal meet-up. She will be at Matsu Sushi from 6:15pm-7:30pm, at which time, would enjoy meeting anyone, She is the artist exhibiting there so the restaurant will know who she is. Afterwards the Street Party is available for people who want to walk around. She will send out her phone #. 

 Cost:

1. Street Party is Free

2. Matsu Sushi is "Dutch Treat"

 

 

More about - -Art About Town...

http://artabouttownwestport.com/

The Westport Downtown Merchants Association invites you to their annual spring community event, ART ABOUT TOWN.

ART ABOUT TOWN brings original, affordable and obtainable artwork to shop and restaurant windows, turning the vibrant Westport shopping district into one continuous gallery to stroll along and enjoy.  All works are juried by local experts and will be for sale.

ART ABOUT TOWN begins with a festive Opening Night Celebration on Thursday May 24th from 5:30 pm-8:30 pm. That night, Main Street will be traffic-free and filled with music, street performers, art demonstrations and refreshments. Participating businesses will stay open late and will have some surprises in store as well.

Art will remain on display through Sunday, June 17th.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Matsu Sushi. Beverly will be wearing beaded orange jewelry scarf
item.name: Art About Town
